name: Punchman (DevBoiAgru)
description:
THE NICEST* RAGDOLL BEATER!

Give those ragdolls pain with the brutal-est ways you can think of, beat them with a bat, a pipe, or just punch them with your boxing glove! Other then that enjoy them suffer with various contraptions all over the map.

You can even run them over with a car (o_o)

And you can crush them too (o_o)

Endless fun to be had, Enjoy!

*not tested by any audience. for representation only.
